Text: I am seeding now
seed please

OMG, I am so glad they fixed the whole overheating brakes thing - I was worried they'd never get to it. 

Seriously though, rewrote the brake algorithm? That is a little incongruous with the normal development process. Even if users were complaining vehemently on the forums about brake failure...I mean who even HAS toe brakes that can apply 50% pressure? Much less expose a deficiency in the braking algorithm. Oh and spool-up from 32 fake to 60 realistic seconds - whew!

The whole thing sounds weird. No offense but I think it's time to move on to the next plane, or at least fix something useful like the screwed up view key assignments.
